objects.name: Analytic 0700
objects.description: Execution of Homebrew, pip3, npm, or manually downloaded PKGs from Terminal or shell, followed by the creation of startup agents, interpreter spawns, or outbound connections to unfamiliar domains. Defender links Terminal commands to plist creation, unsigned binary launches, and `python3` or `node` processes connecting to remote endpoints.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Command line invocation of pip3, brew install, npm install from interactive Terminal

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Creation of new LaunchAgent or LoginItem plist files in ~/Library/LaunchAgents/

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: NSM:Flow
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Outbound HTTP/S initiated by newly installed interpreter process

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: Filter user persistence plist directories like ~/Library/LaunchAgents
Enable alerting for new binaries lacking Apple or organization signature
Correlate install action to interpreter-based network behavior
